task: Develop a basic Gomoku game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Turn it upside down'.
name: Upside Down Gomoku

branding_data.short_description: Upside Down Gomoku is a unique twist on the classic Gomoku game where players need to think and strategize differently by utilizing an upside-down approach.
branding_data.detailed_description: Upside Down Gomoku is a variation of the traditional Gomoku game where players place stones on a grid to try and get five in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. However, in this version, the game board is flipped upside down, adding a new layer of complexity to the gameplay. Players must now think differently and strategize in unconventional ways to outsmart their opponents. Upside Down Gomoku offers a fresh challenge to fans of the original game, requiring them to adapt their tactics to succeed in this innovative twist.
